Description: We are currently looking for a reliable and responsible individual to join our team at Sater Medical Center . As a delivery person, you will play a crucial role in our operations by safely and efficiently transporting products, and equipment to various destinations. Your primary responsibility will be to ensure timely delivery and pickup while maintaining a high level of professionalism and adherence to traffic and safety regulations.Skills
Skills: - Valid driver's license with a clean driving record.
- Proven experience as a driver, preferably in a commercial or delivery capacity.
Familiarity with local roads, routes, and traffic patterns.
- Excellent driving skills and knowledge of safe driving practices.
- Strong time management and organizational skills to ensure timely delivery.
- Ability to handle physical tasks, including loading and unloading materials.
- Ability to work independently and follow instructions.
- Attention to detail and commitment to accuracy in record-keeping.
- Flexibility to work occasional evenings or weekends, if required.
- Knowledge of vehicle maintenance and basic troubleshooting is a plus.
